name: A Moment of a Self Portrait
name_original: A Moment of a Self Portrait
description: Essentially this game is an OCD simulator, with the intention of allowing people who do not have it to better understand the emotional gripes people with this illness have to deal with. This game is not for the faint-hearted, and comes with a big fat trigger warning. However, players who persevere will surely walk away with a (hopefully) meaningful experience.
